applications.name: Zoom
applications.description: Zoom is a video conferencing platform for virtual meetings, webinars, and screen sharing. It includes accessibility features like keyboard shortcuts, screen reader support, live transcription, and closed captions for inclusive virtual communication.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and Forward Slash together to display list of all keyboard shortcuts in Zoom.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce shortcuts window opened. View all available shortcuts.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and F4 together to close the current Zoom window or dialog.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce window closing. Minimizes to system tray rather than fully exiting on some systems.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and L together to switch between portrait and landscape view orientations.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce orientation changed. Changes window layout.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and J together to open join meeting dialog where you enter meeting ID to join.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce join meeting dialog. Enter meeting ID and password to join.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and S together to open schedule meeting dialog for creating new scheduled meeting.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce schedule dialog. Set date, time, and meeting options.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and A together to mute or unmute your microphone during meeting.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce microphone muted or unmuted. Essential control for meeting participation. Notification appears briefly on screen.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and V together to start or stop your video camera during meeting.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce camera started or stopped. Video feed turns on or off.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt, Shift, and S together to start or stop screen sharing with meeting participants.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce screen share dialog or screen sharing stopped. Select window or entire screen to share.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and T together to pause or resume screen sharing without stopping the share session.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce screen share paused or resumed. Share pauses temporarily.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt, Shift, and S together to initiate new screen share or switch to different screen.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce screen share options. Select new content to share.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and R together to start or stop recording the meeting to your local computer.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce recording started or stopped. Requires host permission. Participants notified when recording active.

shortcuts.context: During meeting with cloud recording enabled
shortcuts.description: Press Alt and C together to start or stop recording the meeting to Zoom cloud storage.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce cloud recording started or stopped. Requires paid Zoom account.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and Q together to leave or end the meeting. Host can end meeting for all.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce leave meeting dialog. Confirm to leave or end for all participants.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and I together to open invite dialog for adding more participants to meeting.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce invite window. Copy meeting link or send email invitations.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and H together to show or hide the meeting control toolbar at bottom of screen.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce controls shown or hidden. Hover mouse or use shortcut to reveal controls.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and H together to open or close the chat panel for text messaging during meeting.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce chat panel opened or closed. Send messages to everyone or privately to individuals.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and U together to open or close participants panel showing list of meeting attendees.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce participants panel opened. View and manage meeting participants.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and Y together to raise your hand to get attention or lower previously raised hand.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce hand raised or lowered. Notifies host and participants you have question or comment.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and N together to switch between available camera sources if multiple cameras connected.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce camera switched. Cycles through available cameras.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and F1 together to switch to speaker view showing active speaker in large window.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce speaker view active. Focuses on person currently speaking.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and F2 together to switch to gallery view showing multiple participants in grid layout.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce gallery view active. Shows up to 49 participants simultaneously.

shortcuts.context: In gallery view with multiple pages
shortcuts.description: Press Page Up to view previous page of participants in gallery view.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce previous page. Navigate through participants when more than fit on one screen.

shortcuts.context: In gallery view with multiple pages
shortcuts.description: Press Page Down to view next page of participants in gallery view.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce next page. Cycle through all meeting participants.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and F together to enter or exit fullscreen mode for meeting window.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce fullscreen mode entered or exited. Hides other applications.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and F4 to minimize Zoom meeting window to taskbar while staying in meeting.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce window minimized. Meeting continues in background.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and T together to toggle always on top mode for minimized meeting window.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce always on top toggled. Keeps meeting window visible above other apps.

shortcuts.description: Hold Space bar to temporarily unmute your microphone while speaking, releases when you stop pressing.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce temporarily unmuted while Space held. Useful for staying muted except when speaking. Must enable in settings.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt, Shift, and M together to toggle original sound for music and high-fidelity audio.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce original sound enabled or disabled. Preserves audio quality for music.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and C together to start or stop live transcription showing real-time captions.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce live transcription started or stopped. Displays automated captions. Essential accessibility feature for deaf and hard of hearing users.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and C together to show or hide closed captions during meeting.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce captions shown or hidden. Displays live or manual captions.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt, Shift, and G together to gain remote control of shared screen when granted by host.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce remote control granted. Can control mouse and keyboard on shared screen.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt, Shift, and R together to release remote control of shared screen.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce remote control released. Returns control to original sharer.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and R together to show emoji reactions panel for sending quick reactions like thumbs up or clap.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce reactions panel. Select emoji to briefly display reaction.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt, Shift, and V together to open video filters menu for backgrounds and effects.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce filters menu. Select virtual background or apply effects.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and Y together to raise hand in webinar to ask question or get panelist attention.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce hand raised. Notifies panelists and host.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and Q together to open Q&A panel for asking or answering questions in webinar.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Q&A panel opened. Submit questions or view answers as attendee.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt, Shift, and A together to open Zoom Apps panel for using integrated third-party apps.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Zoom Apps panel opened. Access apps like polls, whiteboard, etc.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt, Shift, and T together to take screenshot of current meeting view.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce screenshot taken. Saves to default screenshots folder.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and Plus together to zoom in on shared screen content for better visibility.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers may announce zoom level. Magnifies shared content.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and Minus together to zoom out on shared screen content.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers may announce zoom level.
